sourcesContent:
import ObservacionesController from '../controllers/ObservacionesController'
import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'

const router = routerx()

router.post('/registro', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.register)
router.get('/lista', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.list)
router.put('/actualizar', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.update)


export default router;

import ObservacionesController from '../controllers/ObservacionesController'
import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'

const router = routerx()

router.post('/registro', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.register)
router.get('/lista', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.list)
router.put('/actualizar', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.update)
router.delete('/borrar/:id', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.remove)


export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import RutCapController from '../controllers/RutCapController'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'

const router = routerx()

router.post('/registro', auth.verifyUser, RutCapController.register)
router.get('/lista',auth.verifyUser,  RutCapController.list)
router.put('/actualizar', auth.verifyUser, RutCapController.update)
router.put('/borrar/:id', auth.verifyUser, RutCapController.remove)



export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import RutCapController from '../controllers/RutCapController'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'

const router = routerx()

router.post('/registro', auth.verifyUser, RutCapController.register)
router.get('/lista',auth.verifyUser,  RutCapController.list)
router.put('/actualizar', auth.verifyUser, RutCapController.update)
router.delete('/borrar/:id', auth.verifyUser, RutCapController.remove)



export default router;

import LecturasController from '../controllers/LecturasController'
import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import multiparty from 'connect-multiparty'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'

const router = routerx()
var path = multiparty({uploadDir: './uploads/medidores'})


router.post('/registro', [auth.verifyUser, path], LecturasController.register)
router.get('/lista', auth.verifyUser, LecturasController.list)
router.put('/actualizar', [auth.verifyUser, path], LecturasController.update)
router.delete('/borrar/:id', auth.verifyUser, LecturasController.remove)

export default router;

const router = routerx()

router.post('/registro', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.register)
router.get('/lista', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.list)
router.put('/actualizar', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.update)
router.delete('/borrar/:id', auth.verifyUser, ObservacionesController.remove)


export default router;

import LecturasController from '../controllers/LecturasController'
import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import multiparty from 'connect-multiparty'

var path = multiparty({uploadDir: './uploads/covers'})

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import UserController from '../controllers/UserController'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'

const router = routerx()

router.post('/register', UserController.register)
router.post('/register_admin', auth.verifyAdmin, UserController.register_admin)
router.post('/login', UserController.login)
router.delete('/remove',auth.verifyAdmin, UserController.remove)
router.post('/login_admin', UserController.login_admin)

export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import UserController from '../controllers/UserController'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'

const router = routerx()

router.post('/register', UserController.register)
router.post('/register_admin', auth.verifyAdmin, UserController.register_admin)
router.post('/login', UserController.login)
router.delete('/remove',auth.verifyAdmin, UserController.remove)
router.post('/login_admin', UserController.login_admin)

export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import multiparty from 'connect-multiparty'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'
import TopicsController from '../controllers/TopicsController'

const router = routerx()
var path = multiparty({uploadDir: './uploads/covers'})


router.post('/register', [auth.verifyCreator, path], TopicsController.register)
router.get('/list', auth.verifyReader, TopicsController.list)
router.put('/update', [auth.verifyCreator, path], TopicsController.update)
router.delete('/delete/:id', auth.verifyAdmin, TopicsController.remove)


export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import multiparty from 'connect-multiparty'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'
import TopicsController from '../controllers/TopicsController'

const router = routerx()
var path = multiparty({uploadDir: './uploads/covers'})

router.get('/list', auth.verifyReader, TopicsController.list)
router.put('/update', [auth.verifyCreator, path], TopicsController.update)
router.delete('/delete/:id', auth.verifyAdmin, TopicsController.remove)


export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import multiparty from 'connect-multiparty'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'
import CategorieController from '../controllers/CategorieController'

const router = routerx()
var path = multiparty({uploadDir: './uploads/covers'})


router.post('/register', [auth.verifyCreator, path], CategorieController.register)
router.get('/list', auth.verifyReader, CategorieController.list)
router.put('/update', [auth.verifyCreator, path], CategorieController.update)
router.delete('/delete/:id', auth.verifyAdmin, CategorieController.remove)


export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import multiparty from 'connect-multiparty'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'
import CategorieController from '../controllers/CategorieController'

const router = routerx()
var path = multiparty({uploadDir: './uploads/covers'})


router.post('/register', [auth.verifyCreator, path], CategorieController.register)
router.get('/list', auth.verifyReader, CategorieController.list)
router.put('/update', [auth.verifyCreator, path], CategorieController.update)
router.delete('/delete/:id', auth.verifyAdmin, CategorieController.remove)


export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import multiparty from 'connect-multiparty'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'
import ContentController from '../controllers/ContentController'

const router = routerx()
var path = multiparty({uploadDir: './uploads/contents'})


router.post('/register', [auth.verifyCreator, path], ContentController.register)
router.get('/list', auth.verifyReader, ContentController.list)
router.get('/home/list',  ContentController.home_list)
router.get('/show/:id', auth.verifyCreator, ContentController.show)
router.put('/update', [auth.verifyCreator, path], ContentController.update)
router.delete('/delete/:id', auth.verifyAdmin, ContentController.remove)



export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import multiparty from 'connect-multiparty'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'
import ContentController from '../controllers/ContentController'

const router = routerx()
var path = multiparty({uploadDir: './uploads/contents'})


router.post('/register', [auth.verifyCreator, path], ContentController.register)
router.get('/list', auth.verifyReader, ContentController.list)
router.get('/home/list',  ContentController.home_list)
router.get('/show/:id', auth.verifyCreator, ContentController.show)
router.put('/update', [auth.verifyCreator, path], ContentController.update)
router.delete('/delete/:id', auth.verifyAdmin, ContentController.remove)
router.get('/uploads/contents/:img', ContentController.obtainImage)



export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import UserController from '../controllers/UserController'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'

const router = routerx()

router.post('/register', UserController.register)
router.post('/register_admin', auth.verifyAdmin, UserController.register_admin)
router.post('/login', UserController.login)
router.delete('/remove',auth.verifyAdmin, UserController.remove)
router.post('/login_admin', UserController.login_admin)

export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import multiparty from 'connect-multiparty'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'
import TopicsController from '../controllers/TopicsController'

const router = routerx()
var path = multiparty({uploadDir: './uploads/covers'})


router.post('/register', [auth.verifyCreator, path], TopicsController.register)
router.get('/list', auth.verifyReader, TopicsController.list)
router.put('/update', [auth.verifyCreator, path], TopicsController.update)
router.delete('/delete/:id', auth.verifyAdmin, TopicsController.remove)


export default router;

import routerx from 'express-promise-router'
import multiparty from 'connect-multiparty'
import auth from '../middleware/auth'
import ContentController from '../controllers/ContentController'

const router = routerx()
var path = multiparty({uploadDir: './uploads/contents'})


router.post('/register', [auth.verifyCreator, path], ContentController.register)
router.get('/list', auth.verifyReader, ContentController.list)
router.get('/home/list',  ContentController.home_list)
router.get('/show/:id', auth.verifyCreator, ContentController.show)
router.put('/update', [auth.verifyCreator, path], ContentController.update)
router.delete('/delete/:id', auth.verifyAdmin, ContentController.remove)
router.get('/uploads/contents/:img', ContentController.obtainImage)



export default router;
